RawLine: TNPC_70004046,【看來{color=#FF0000}這骰子就是神機門流傳在外的機關之一{/color}。】,【看来{color=#FF0000}这骰子就是神机门流传在外的机关之一{/color}。】

Items.mt: <[>It seems that this dice is one of the mechanisms passed down from the Divine Principle. <]> The dice are one of the mechanisms that have been passed down to the world.
